alert.note: Alert for Denton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 2:53PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Denton County through 330 PM CDT... At 253 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sanger, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Denton, Corinth, Sanger, Celina, Krum, Argyle, Shady Shores, Aubrey, Krugerville, Cross Roads, Ray Roberts Park Isle Du Bois, Ray Roberts Park Johnson Branch, Oak Point, Lincoln Park, Providence Village, Bolivar, Lake Ray Roberts and Lewisville Lake. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 468 and 481. Interstate 35W between mile markers 77 and 85. Interstate 35E between mile markers 460 and 466. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
